## IPlaywrightTunnelOptions type

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Options for configuring a [PlaywrightTunnel](./playwright-browser-tunnel.playwrighttunnel.md) instance.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type IPlaywrightTunnelOptions = {
    terminal: ITerminal;
    onStatusChange: (status: TunnelStatus) => void;
    playwrightInstallPath: string;
    onBeforeLaunch?: (handshake: IHandshake) => Promise<boolean> | boolean;
} & ({
    mode: 'poll-connection';
    wsEndpoint: string;
} | {
    mode: 'wait-for-incoming-connection';
    listenPort: number;
});
```
**References:** [ITerminal](./terminal.iterminal.md)<></>, [TunnelStatus](./playwright-browser-tunnel.tunnelstatus.md)<></>, [IHandshake](./playwright-browser-tunnel.ihandshake.md)
